page.title: 16THE M4/ROAD SYSTEMS
page.content:
The M4 is one of the busiest motorways approaching London.The road carries traffic from the west e.g. Bristol and Newport. Its location is very important as it runs parallel to Heathrow Airport, which is about eight miles from the end of the Motorway in Chiswick. This aspect is quite an important factor as there are many commercial interests using the airport as a base, therefore they need fast and easy access.
There is an ever-increasing volume of traffic using this route and as a consequence there is often a very heavy build-up of traffic entering central London. Chiswick boasts one of the busiest intersections in Europe - not something the local residents are proud of though.
